cards

Class HandCards

  • java.lang.Object
    • cards.HandCards

  • public class HandCards
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represent the 5 cards in the game, that are owned by the player.
    Author:
    Alexandre Candeias, Pedro Martinho, Rui Figueiredo
